item.title: Introducing Signal Secure Backups
item.description: ðŸ“± Signal has introduced secure backups, addressing a long-standing user request. This new opt-in feature allows users to back up their message history, ensuring important conversations are not lost if a phone is damaged or lost. Currently available in beta for Android, it will soon roll out to iOS and Desktop. Secure backups are end-to-end encrypted and refresh daily for added security. #Signal #SecureBackups #Privacy #Messaging #TechUpdates
